info.name: Meta
info.attribution:
INSTRUCTIONS: Players take seats. Set options. Press play button. Random player is chosen to start. Drag game tokens from tan holder. Play either in common area (in designated space) or in player personal area (in designated space). Scoring is automatic and updated with every move. Scores displayed by player seats. Turn indicator advances automatically. If turn indicator is incorrect (this happens when drawing an action card from the expansion pack), use turn button in lower left to change indicator to correct player. For single player version, a discard area is added.

The game layout and room design are by LawDawg and are released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The house, meeple, pin, and marble tokens are by mousewax and are released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The background image by Martin Stokow is in the Public Domain under CC0: https://publicdomainpictures.net/en/view-image.php?image=370218&picture=grunge-background-texture-marble.

The cards and dice tokens are in the Public Domain under CC0: https://publicdomainvectors.org/en/free-clipart/Cards-vector-illustration/8578.html and https://publicdomainvectors.org/en/free-clipart/Pair-of-cubes/39211.html.

The chess tokens are in the Public Domain under CC0: https://freesvg.org/low-poly-chess-pieces.
info.description: Collect pieces to score points. The more pieces that match the patterns (all the same, all different, multiple pairs, etc.), the more points the player earns. During turn, draw a piece and play it or put it in communal area. Most points wins.

fields.text: You are about to restart the game are you sure?

play.text: All players move 1 token from pesonal area to scoring area.

exchange.text: All players swap 1 token from personal area with common area

take.text: All players give one card to player on right (counter-clickwise).
